Text: You're doing a great job Saturn, and we really appreciate it. If you posted this torrent on Demonoid as well, you'd get a lot more seeders.
Hey Saturn. Good to see you over from the site that died an unfortunate death between Christmas and New Years. I really wished I would have gotten Q's email addy. Oh well. Thanks for doing this.

hayesy316, I'll look into that.

helldar, yeah, I figured that Quazza has put in a ton of time and might just need a break.  The death of that site may have given him that chance.  I dunno, just guessing.
saturn, if you need an invite for demonoid, let me know
